*/ /**

import colors from"assets/theme-dark/base/colors";// Material Dashboard 2 React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem";import rgba from"assets/theme-dark/functions/rgba";var white=colors.white;var borders={borderColor:rgba(white.main,0.4),borderWidth:{0:0,1:pxToRem(1),2:pxToRem(2),3:pxToRem(3),4:pxToRem(4),5:pxToRem(5)},borderRadius:{xs:pxToRem(1.6),sm:pxToRem(2),md:pxToRem(6),lg:pxToRem(8),xl:pxToRem(12),xxl:pxToRem(16),section:pxToRem(160)}};export default borders;
